articles.content: Marc Manara, OpenAI’s head of startups, says the reality of AI has advanced far beyond ideas and experiments. AI-native companies are hitting $200 million in annual recurring revenue, and product cycles have shrunk from two-week sprints to single days. And OpenAI is helping. Today on TechCrunc

articles.author: Muhammad Zulhusni

articles.title: SoftBank’s Nvidia sale rattles market, raises questions
articles.summary: Masayoshi Son's latest move to cash out his entire $5. 8 billion Nvidia stake to go all in on AI surprised the business world on Tuesday, but maybe it should not.
articles.content: Masayoshi Son's latest move to cash out his entire $5.8 billion Nvidia stake to go all in on AI surprised the business world on Tuesday, but maybe it should not. At this point, it’s almost more surprising when the 68-year-old Son doesn’t push his chips to the center of the table.
articles.author: Connie Loizos

articles.title: Immortality startup Eternos nabs $10.3M, pivots to personal AI that sounds like you
articles.summary: Eternos developed the Human Life Model (HLM) — a framework that uses only an individual's data, rather than general LLM data, to capture their unique values, life story, and decision-making traits.  T.
articles.content: Eternos developed the Human Life Model (HLM) — a framework that uses only an individual's data, rather than general LLM data, to capture their unique values, life story, and decision-making traits. The company has rebranded as Uare.ai and raised $10.3 million in seed funding led by Mayfield and Bold
articles.author: Marina Temkin
